articles.description: The Duchess of Sussex, 39, stunned in a £2,600 soft blue Oscar de la Renta gown embroidered with lemons as she made her first appearance since quitting the royal family yesterday.
articles.content:
Meghan Markle stunned in a £2,600 soft blue Oscar de la Renta gown embroidered with lemons as she made her first appearance since quitting the royal family yesterday.
